data.name: AirRacer
data.description:
Do you have what it takes to pilot a hovercraft going at top speed? Then the high-risk sport of Air Racing is for you!

Compete in interplanetary races, collect new ships as you advance your career, and claim your place on the leaderboard! 

AirRacer is a VR racing game that you can play anywhere. Just tilt your head to control the vehicle, no controllers needed!

FEATURES:
ü™ê Planet pack containing 5 different race tracks with varying environments, and many surprises along the road!

üöÄUnlock new speeder ships as you progress!

‚úîÔ∏èFirst map is always free to play!

üèÅ Gameplay with high speed and action-filled competitions!

üõ† Further development and planet packs planned to be released!

üó® Make sure to join our discord in order to talk to devs, compete with other players, and be notified of upcoming official competitions with the chance to win prizes!

Our first planet pack has now been released!
Start your campaign on the desert planet of Ankeros. Make your way across this arid planet competing on 5 different race tracks. 
Go head to head with other players, climb the leaderboard and earn the title of Top AirRacer!
